title: Introduction
content: I was initially drawn to web development due to my limited experience with programming in the Navy, and after pursuing computer science studies for a brief period. Since then, I have been completely self-taught, and specialize in HTML/CSS, JavaScript, Reactjs, and Bootstrap.

title: Challenges and Persistence
content: As with any project, challenges always arise, but I enjoy the problem-solving process and overcome them with persistence and extensive online research.

title: Projects and Achievements
content: One project that I am particularly proud of is a Natural Language Processing web app I created using an API.

title: Approach to Problem-Solving
content: When it comes to problem-solving, I take a methodical approach by first considering different possible solutions, followed by trial and error, and further research.

title: Staying Up-to-Date
content: I stay up-to-date with the latest trends and developments in web development through various sources such as YouTube, Reddit, and newsletters.

title: Working with Clients
content: I work closely with clients to ensure their website meets their needs and goals through constant communication.

title: Passion for Web Development
content: What sets me apart from other web developers is my genuine love for what I do. The challenge of web development keeps me in a 'grind mindset' and I find joy in the process of bringing a website to life.
